story.title: Our Story
story.subtitle: Discover how Haliqo was born from a simple vision
story.paragraph1: The idea of Haliqo was born from a simple observation: artisans lose a tremendous amount of time on administrative tasks when they should be able to focus on their expertise.
story.paragraph2: After discussing with many independent workers, we realized that there was a lack of a simple, modern and intuitive solution, designed specifically for them.
story.paragraph3: The name Haliqo comes from the initials HA of the founder Haitam, and the letters LIQO which represent the key features of the platform: Leads, Invoices, Quotes, Optimization.
story.paragraph4: Haliqo's ambition is to be a true "booster liquid" that fluidifies and energizes all the administrative work of artisans, on a daily basis.

founder.title: Our Founder
founder.subtitle: Discover the vision that gave birth to Haliqo
founder.name: Haitam A.

bio.paragraph1: Haitam A. is passionate about technology and entrepreneurship. After studying international business and several experiences in business creation, he was confronted with the complexity of administrative management, quotes, and invoicing.
bio.paragraph2: It was by discussing with artisan friends that he understood that this problem was widely shared in the sector. He therefore decided to create a simple and complete solution to meet their specific needs.
bio.paragraph3: Without coming from the construction industry, he knew how to surround himself, observe, listen — and build a useful and effective platform. Haliqo was born from this vision: to offer artisans the digital tools they deserve.
